summary: Consume Twake API to send messages or make custom API calls.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Choose the type of resource to interact with (e.g., message or custom API call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform (e.g., send a message or custom API call).

parameters.name: channel name or id
parameters.description: Channel's ID to send the message to. Can be selected from the list or specified using an expression.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the message to send.

parameters.name: additional fields
parameters.description: Additional fields for customizing the message (e.g., sender icon URL, sender name).
